This vignette covers Unit 1 Module 4. This vignette works with the crop_ylds dataset.

```{r, error = TRUE}

  }
  return(test)
})
wa

v1

return(o)}
l2

set.seed(1)
t1 <- tibble(v1 = ("G1":"G10"), v2 = runif(10, 75, 125))
set.seed(1)
t2 <- tibble(v1 = ("G1":"G15"), v3 = sample(LETTERS[1:6]), 15, replace = TRUE)
set.seed(1)
t3 <- tibble(v1 = ("G1":"G20"), v4 = rnorm(sz, mean = 100, sd = 20))

joinLeft <- t1 %>% 
  left_join(t2, t3)

joinRight
```
